HomePage.title: About us
HomePage.description: SNIP is a straw products workshop where we are inspired by traditional culture to interpret it in a modern interior. The value of our products is that they are created by hand from grain to stem, from straw to spider. We sow rye on our native fields, grow and take care of it, then harvest it by hand and prepare rye straw for the next work.

logo.description: Rye… Born from the earth… warmed by the sun… watered by the rain… wrapped in the wind… created by hand…

InviteUs.descriptionText: Today, growing rye requires more effort, resources, and opportunities than ever before. Living in a metropolis, not everyone can prepare straw by hand. But everyone can do it themselves.
InviteUs.cardListText: We are happy to conduct live master classes on making spiders for your friends, employees, or clients. To do this, write to us or call us at the contact details provided and we will agree on the details of the meeting.

DoItYourself.title: Do it yourself
DoItYourself.text: It is known that activities related to creativity and crafts have a therapeutic effect on a person, and the result created by one's own hands gives a sense of self-worth and joy.
DoItYourself.mainBottomText: Here you will find video instructions for weaving spiders from your own rye straw.
